title: Enemy picked Cammile?
body: guess i have to dodge. already got ***outplayed*** from champ select.

replies.body: What's your biggest problem when facing her?

From her true to dmg to her half a lane dash to her aoe slow to her unescapable ultimate that does a butt ton of dmg to her shield that makes her unburstable. gee i dunno maybe i'm bad and riots champs are always balanced and not overloaded.
Just keep in mind to CC or avoid her second Q, her E is on a long cooldown early on, and her W is similar to dodging a darius spin

I have complaints about plenty of top lane champs. But i know there's always a weakness to them and Camille has some too. I think one of the biggest things is to find it and know when to exploit it. I've played as and against Camille and shes no more hard to deal with than a top lane darius or Yasuo, or even fiora

> [{quoted}](name=yourmother671,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=scjAzP6x,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-24T19:43:20.632+0000)
>
> I have complaints about plenty of top lane champs. But i know there's always a weakness to them and Camille has some too. I think one of the biggest things is to find it and know when to exploit it. I've played as and against Camille and shes no more hard to deal with than a top lane darius or Yasuo, or even fiora

Uh, nuh uh, Darius is one of the easiest match ups in the game as long as you aren't hard countered/countered.

> [{quoted}](name=L Rayquaza,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=scjAzP6x,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-24T19:49:03.732+0000)
>
> Play {{champion:122}}, {{champion:24}}, {{champion:114}},{{champion:133}}, {{champion:98}}, or {{champion:80}} into Camille

As a {{champion:80}} main, i agree. Camille never gives me trouble till late game, like 25-30min+

> [{quoted}](name=yourmother671,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=scjAzP6x,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2017-01-24T19:50:40.722+0000)
>
> As a {{champion:80}} main, i agree. Camille never gives me trouble till late game, like 25-30min+

Or you can just play Fiora and she never gives you trouble period lol. Riposte her stun and if she tries to ultimate you she might as well jump into your fountain, she'll die slower.

> [{quoted}](name=Kaioko,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=scjAzP6x,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2017-01-24T20:01:32.184+0000)
>
> Or you can just play Fiora and she never gives you trouble period lol. Riposte her stun and if she tries to ultimate you she might as well jump into your fountain, she'll die slower.

Early she outstats you (before you get W), so theres that. Also her E cd is lower than ur W cd.
oh dont worry lad she is jungle. most of the players i've seen abuse her in the jungle. if i wanna lane cammile i just pick Trynda lol.
You see, the problem is that you aren't playing Singed
I don't play top lane often, but this might help you. https://rankedboost.com/league-of-legends/counter/camille/
